Package rj.tools.jcsc.ui

Interface Summary
JcscTab JcscTab has to be realized by all tabs on the JCSC RulesPanel which is displayed on the RulesDialog.
 

Class Summary
AbstractJcscTab Abstract implementation for JcscTabs on the RulesPanel.
ExamplePanel Encapsulates a JEditorPane into a scrollpane and provides some methods to set certain properties
RulesDialog RulesDialog is the dialog in which the rules for JCSC can be specified.
RulesPanel RulesPanel is a Swing UI JPanel to visually set the JCSC properties
UIString Class which represents a String on the JCSC UI.
XMLI18nMap Map which contains the strings depending on specific language.
